entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
